posts.post_content: Love this guy. Central card in my [High Tide](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=High Tide) infinite mana deck. I use draw/discard cards like [Careful Study](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Careful Study) and brainstorm/ponder in combo with [Predict](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Predict) to get him in my GY and keep my hand up, and then if my opponent is tapped out on my third turn, I'll cast High tide, unearth him and drop a [Pemmin's Aura](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Pemmin's Aura), go infinite (mana, and untapping permanents, mind you) and use whatever I want to kill my opponent: [Millstone](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Millstone), [Goblin Cannon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Cannon), [Oona, Queen of the Fae](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Oona, Queen of the Fae) or just good old [Ambassador Laquatus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ambassador Laquatus). Fun stuff.
posts.html:
Love this guy. Central card in my High Tide infinite mana deck. I use draw/discard cards like Careful Study and brainstorm/ponder in combo with Predict to get him in my GY and keep my hand up, and then if my opponent is tapped out on my third turn, I'll cast High tide, unearth him and drop a Pemmin's Aura, go infinite (mana, and untapping permanents, mind you) and use whatever I want to kill my opponent: Millstone, Goblin Cannon, Oona, Queen of the Fae or just good old Ambassador Laquatus. Fun stuff.

posts.post_content: Extremely versatile card. The combo with [Royal Assassin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Royal Assassin) is obvious, but he also accelerates your mana production by untapping lands, protects against big combat threats and allows all sorts of combos with various tap abilities.

posts.post_content:
A very underrated guy. At worst he's a [reflecting pool](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=reflecting pool) and [Icy manipulator](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Icy manipulator). At best he can untap the ravnica bouncelands, untap [Obelisk of Alara](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Obelisk of Alara) and other powerful cards that tap for something.  
  
It's taken a lot of years before they finally made a card that can tap or untap just a permanent at zero cost. It's a shame it isn't played more. He's even a [twiddle](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=twiddle) if someone kills him off.
posts.html:
A very underrated guy. At worst he's a reflecting pool and Icy manipulator. At best he can untap the ravnica bouncelands, untap Obelisk of Alara and other powerful cards that tap for something.

It's taken a lot of years before they finally made a card that can tap or untap just a permanent at zero cost. It's a shame it isn't played more. He's even a twiddle if someone kills him off.
